thread.title: Brandon Wulff;
thread.title_full: Instant Gaming évalué par Brandon Wulff;

author: Brandon Wulff;
title: Brandon Wulff;
text: Instant is in the name of the company for a reason. Paid for my game (Dishonored 2) which by the way is 80$ on steam and I got it for 35$ here and got it instantly. I mean less than 5 seconds after payment just the time my browser took to load and voila it was there. Great company. Purchased many games over the years and would recommend 1000x over G2A.
